para.programlisting: <simpleType name="LocationType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="bboxLocationRequest"/> <enumeration value="panLocationRequest"/> <enumeration value="zoomPointLocationRequest"/> <enumeration value="recenterLocationRequest"/> </restriction> </simpleType>

listitem.para: bboxLocationRequest - recenters on a bounding box
zoomPointLocationRequest - recenters on a point, includes relative zoom and fixed scale
maxBbox - maximum bounding box. If given parameters lead to a larger bounding box, it will be cropped (see for a description of type Bbox)

para.programlisting: <complexType name="LocationRequest"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="locationType" type="types:LocationType"/> <element name="bboxLocationRequest" type="types:BboxLocationRequest" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="panLocationRequest" type="types:PanLocationRequest" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="zoomPointLocationRequest" type="types:ZoomPointLocationRequest" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="recenterLocationRequest" type="types:RecenterLocationRequest" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="locationConstraint" type="types:LocationConstraint" minOccurs="0"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: className - "LocationRequest" or extended class name if project implements an extension
locationConstraint - constraint to be respected when location request is executed
bbox - bounding box to be recentered on (see for a description of type Bbox)

para.programlisting: <simpleType name="PanDirectionType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="VERTICAL_PAN_NORTH"/> <enumeration value="VERTICAL_PAN_NONE"/> <enumeration value="VERTICAL_PAN_SOUTH"/> <enumeration value="HORIZONTAL_PAN_WEST"/> <enumeration value="HORIZONTAL_PAN_NONE"/> <enumeration value="HORIZONTAL_PAN_EAST"/> </restriction> </simpleType>

listitem.para: bbox - current bounding box (see for a description of type Bbox)

para.programlisting: <simpleType name="ZoomType"> <restriction base="xsd:string"> <enumeration value="ZOOM_DIRECTION_IN"/> <enumeration value="ZOOM_DIRECTION_NONE"/> <enumeration value="ZOOM_DIRECTION_OUT"/> <enumeration value="ZOOM_FACTOR"/> <enumeration value="ZOOM_SCALE"/> </restriction> </simpleType>

listitem.para: ZOOM_DIRECTION_NONE - no zoom, recenter on point only
ZOOM_FACTOR - zoom using a custom factor
ZOOM_SCALE - zoom to a fixed scale

para.programlisting: <complexType name="ZoomPointLocationRequest"> <all> <element name="bbox" type="types:Bbox"/> <element name="point" type="types:Point"/> <element name="zoomType" type="types:ZoomType"/> <element name="zoomFactor" type="xsd:float" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="scale" type="xsd:integer" minOccurs="0"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: bbox - bounding box (unused when zoom type = ZOOM_SCALE)
zoomFactor - zoom factor (unused when zoom type != ZOOM_FACTOR)
scale - fixed scale (unused when zoom type != ZOOM_SCALE)

para.programlisting: <complexType name="IdSelection"> <all> <element name="layerId" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="idAttribute" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="idType" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="selectedIds" type="types:ArrayOfString"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: layerId - ID of layer on which query will be executed
idType - type of ID attribute ("string" or "int")

para.programlisting: <complexType name="LocationResult"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="bbox" type="types:Bbox"/> <element name="scale" type="xsd:double"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: className - "LocationResult" or extended class name if project implements an extension
bbox - new bounding box (see for a description of type Bbox)
